name: The Last Roll (1samuel411)
description:
Story
You play as a health worker who awakens in a super market store. Next thing you know the infected begin to burst through the windows seeking the toilet paper locked inside the super market. You have to use your weapons to take them down. You're awarded money for killing zombies which you can redeem for perks and specials.

Win by beating wave 10.

Perks
- Double Damage - RED
- Self-Revive - YELLOW
- Double Hitpoints - BLUE
- Faster Movement - GREEN

Specials
- Nuke
- Safe (What's inside?)

Controls
WASD - Movement
Left Click - Shoot
Right Click - Aim
E - Interact

Issues
We are using HDRP with Unity and some devices see just a black screen, this is due to shaders not being supported on your device. We don't know what to do about that, so sorry if you can't play. Look at those cool screenshots though!
